text: Robert Halliday may refer to: * Robert Halliday (bishop) (b. 1932), Bishop Emeritus of Brechin * Robert Halliday (footballer) (b. 1986), Scottish football defender * Robert Halliday (businessman) (–1840), Scottish-American businessman ==See also== * Robert Halliday Gunning (1818–1900), Scottish surgeon, entrepreneur and philanthropist. * Robert Holliday (1933–2014), American politician. * Robert Cortes Holliday (1880–1947), American writer and literary editor
title: Robert Halliday
